invDescriptions.name: Sticky Sap
invDescriptions.description: A gooey blob of sap clings to your fingers.
lookBlurbs: It's stickier than a tax collector's handshake.
You're not sure if it's alive or just really clingy.
Smells like a tree had a bad day.
You try to shake it off, but it's stubborn as a mule.

isSticky: It feels like you’ll never get it off your hands.
The sap is nearly impossible to separate from anything it touches.
isSmelly: The smell is overpowering, like rotten wood.

invDescriptions.name: Torch
invDescriptions.description: A wooden torch, warm in your grip.
lookBlurbs: It flickers like it's plotting something.
You wonder how long it'll last before you're in the dark again.
It's a stick that's really into fire.

isLit: The flame dances brightly, casting shadows across your path.
The warmth of the fire makes you feel safer in the dark.

invDescriptions.name: Golden Coin
invDescriptions.description: A shiny coin rests in your palm.
lookBlurbs: It glints like it's mocking your empty pockets.
You flip it and call heads—nobody cares.
Looks like it's seen more adventures than you.

isCursed: The coin feels unnaturally cold in your presence.
A dark energy seems to seep from it.

invDescriptions.name: Magic Lens
invDescriptions.description: A mystical lens that reveals hidden truths.
lookBlurbs: It's from the bottom of a cracker jack box.
If only I could see a way out of here.
Maybe it's just an ordinary magnifying glass?
